segments.text: I was just watching a documentary on TV about how people use dogs for various purpose . It was very interesting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I love dogs . They have been used as guards for centuries . Nowadays , they are often used to find illegal drugs and bombs by the police and customs officers .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The documentary also pointed out that they are used by shepherds to round up sheep and by rescue workers to find people trapped under rubble or snow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Horses are useful to people too . We use them for sports and recreation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don ’ t forget that horses are still used in many countries to pull ploughs and carts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I can . I don ’ t ride regularly though . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ride too . Perhaps we could go horse riding together at the weekend ?
segments.speaker: S2
